ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_1031_01_10:
Ga ha ha! The mountains
and oceans of Pasio!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_1031_02_10:
Where there is nature,
you will find a hiker!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_1031_03_10:
I don’t even need clothes!
I want to feel nature with
my whole body!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0701_01_10:
Not just the mountains. The volcanoes, forests,
caves, and glaciers...
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0701_02_10: Pasio is such a colorful place!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0701_03_10:
I can hardly believe that this island is
completely man-made!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0701_04_10: I bet a lot of Pokémon helped in building it!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0702_01_10:
Pasio isn’t an exception. Other places all have
their strong points, too!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2701_0702_02_10:
And you have to feel that with your whole body!
That is real exploring; that is real adventure!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_1031_02_10:
His tiny hands are so
charming, too...
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_1031_03_10:
And when he tries to hug
you, he vibrates.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0701_01_10:
My partner is Palpitoad.
He’s the Vibration Pokémon. He makes crying
children tremble!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0701_02_10:
If you hug him, you can feel his
stomach vibrating.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0701_03_10: He’s a lot more effective than an ab stimulator!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0701_04_10:
He’s also cool and damp in the summer, so I
can’t recommend this Pokémon enough!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0702_01_10: Palpitoad has a very charming face, doesn’t he?
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2702_0702_02_10:
Whenever I see his face, 
I can’t help but feel at ease.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_1031_01_10:
Rock-type Pokémon are
the embodiment of
adventurous spirit!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_1031_02_10:
Ruggedness!
Real outdoorsmen
ought to be rugged!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_1031_03_10:
Strength of mind and body
is vital in the outdoors!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0701_01_10:
Yeah, no matter how you shake it, 
I like Rock-type Pokémon.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0701_02_10:
It helps that I see them the most when hiking
in the mountains, but that’s not the only reason.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0701_03_10: More than anything, it’s those rugged bodies.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0701_04_10:
Take a look at a Golem, and you’ll know what
I’m talking about.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0702_01_10:
Rock types are hard, sure, 
but they aren’t invincible.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2703_0702_02_10: But I think that just adds to their charm.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_1031_01_10:
I want to know more tricks
on climbing.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_1031_02_10:
I suppose I should ask a
grown-up.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_1031_03_10:
I want to hear more from
Mr. Hiker.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_1032_02_10:
it makes my heart sing to
see young people
interested in hiking.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_1032_03_10:
Pokémon that are born on
the mountains are strong.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_01_10:
Learn the routes that Pokémon on the mountain
use! That makes so much sense!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_02_10:
Ga ha ha!
The same can be said for the oceans and
forests, too!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_03_10:
There are even stories from other places in
which wild Pokémon help lost children get home.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_04_10:
I really have to watch for more Pokémon on
my travels...
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_05_10:
Make sure you ask other Trainers for advice, too.
And if you want to know about mountains, I’ll
answer any of your questions!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_06_10:
Thank you so much! Let’s go hiking
together sometime!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2751_0701_07_10:
I like it! You remind me of myself when I
was younger!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1902_0101_01_10:
I’m a hiker...
I might be big, but I’m a coward...
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1902_0101_02_10:
I guess we can have a Pokémon battle if you
want, but go easy on me, OK?
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1902_0501_01_10: I asked you to go easy on me...
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1902_0601_01_10: Could you be a little...nicer next time?
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1903_0101_01_10:
I’m chasing my dream, and I’m fighting for
a victory!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1903_0601_01_10:
My dream is to research the artificial mountains
on Pasio so I can create my own someday!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/1903_0601_02_10:
Ha ha ha! That’s right. Men are hopeless
romantics no matter how old they get.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_1031_02_10:
Live on the mountain,
and love the mountain.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0101_01_10:
Ga ha ha!
Aren’t the mountains great?
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0101_02_10:
The air is clean, and the waters are
crystal clear!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0101_03_10: And the Pokémon battles are hot! Right?
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0401_01_10: That’s the ticket! Here I go!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0102_01_10:
Ga ha ha! The mountains are great!
The greenery is beautiful!
The clouds are beautiful!
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0102_02_10: Pokémon battles really are hot, aren’t they.
ch0080_00_yamaotoko/2861_0601_01_10: I guess I still have a ways to go!
